explanation:
Answer

7 choose 3
A schedule for Dave's workouts consists of the set of three days he will swim (e.g., {Mon, Wed, Sat}). The order in which he selects the three days of the week does not affect the schedule.

Therefore, Dave is selecting a subset of 3 days from the 7 days of the week.
instructions: Provide solutions in the form "P(n, r)" or "n choose r" (e.g. P(8, 3) or 8 choose 3).
question: Dave swims three times in the week. How many ways are there to plan his workout schedule (i.e. which days he will swim) for a given week?
